mosses that you have never seen before.  The whole place reeks of
death.  You see a small break in the structure of this building,
allowing you to possibly leave to the north.

5065.long: This shop is obviously under construction.

5066.long:
You are on a short street next to the city wall.  To the east, you can
see the side of some kind of metal-working shop, judging by the tools
you can see through the window.  To the west, the city wall looms over
you, casting shadows along the rode.  Hades Street lies just to the
north and the street continues to the south.

5067.long:
This street runs between two buildings, one of them condemned and
rotting.  To the west, you can see through a window into what looks
like some sort of metal-working shop.  The condemned building lies east
and Hades Street is north of here.  The street continues to the south.

5068.long:
The city wall turns here, blocking the west and south exits.  To the
north, you can see the street continue, eventually crossing Hades
Street.  The street also continues to the east.

5069.long:
You're near the entrance to Wenzel's Weapon Shop.  To the south, the
city wall stands, blocking exit in that direction.  North is the
entrance to the shop, and the street continues east and west.

5070.long:
The street intersects a pair of alleys here, both of which look very
run-down and dirty.  The street continues west and north, with two
alleys to the south and east.

5071.long:
You're in an alley between Iron Street and a smaller street.  To the
north, you can see the back of a condemned building, although you can't
see any way to get in.  To the south, you see the entrance to what
appears to be the jeweler's shop.  Iron Street lies to the east and the
alley becomes a more prominent street to the west.

5072.long:
This is an alley in the southwest part of town, far from the main
streets.  To the west, the city wall stands high overhead.  You see the
side of a nondescript building to the east and the alley
continues south.  There is a street to the north.

5073.long:
You're in at the end of a small alley.  There are piles of refuse, but
none of which you'd care to investigate much closer due to the scent.
To the south and west, the city wall blocks your passage.  The alley
continues to the north and east.

5074.long:
The road in this alley is narrow and almost nonexistant.  To the north,
you can see the back of the jeweler's shop, judging by the number of
gems you can see through a window.  The city wall looms to the south.
The alley continues to the west or you can exit to the east where it
intersects Iron Street.

5075.long:
You're on a small street, just south of Ocean Street.  To the west, you
can see the side of what appears to be a church or shrine of some sort,
judging from the holy symbols on the building.  To the east, a sign
proclaims the building as Byrmic's Bar and Grille.  The street becomes
an alley to the south and intersects Ocean Street to the north.

5076.long:
This small alley runs from the city gate towards the southeast corner
of the town.  To the east, the city wall looms up before you, blocking
any movement in that direction.  To the north, you can see Ocean
Street, and there is a tall building to the left, with a window on the
second story.  The alley continues to the south.

5077.long:
You're on a small street, just south of the House of Healing.
To the south, you see the back of some building, but the windows are
shuttered, preventing you from seeing into the building.  There is an
open door to the north, into the House of Healing.  Iron Street lies to
the west and the street becomes an alley to the east.

5078.long:
This is the intersection of an alley and a more-traveled street.  To
the north, the alley widens to a street.  The alley continues in all
other directions.

5079.long:
You're in a slightly littered alley, with small piles of trash lying
around.  To the north, you can see the side of a building.  Through a
window, it looks like a pub of some kind.  The alley continues west and
east and the city wall blocks your passage to the south.

5080.long:
The city wall turns here, running from the east to the south.  Some
sections of the wall are totally covered in the heaps of garbage
however, as this seems to be a rather poorly maintained part of town.
The alley continues to the north and west.

5081.long:
You're in an alley between a building and the city wall.  To the east,
the city wall rises and blocks your passage with its solid brick
construction.  The building to the west is emanating some strange odor,
but you cannot see any means of entrance.  The alley continues to the
north and south.

5082.long:
The alley here intersects Iron Street to the west, where the city gate
opens.  To the south, the city wall blocks your passage.  You can see
the open door to the pawn shop to the north, and there seems to be a
strange odor coming from the opening.  The alley continues to the east.

5083.long:
You're in the southeast corner of the city, where an alley runs along
the city wall.  To the south and east, the city wall prevents passage.
The alley continues to the north and west.

5098.long: This shop is obviously under construction.

5099.long: This shop is obviously under construction.

5100.short: ...You are standing in a huge graveyard.
5100.long:
It is much dimmer here, and you must pause a few seconds for your eyes
to adjust.  As the surrounding area becomes clearer, you can see there
are hundreds of graves stretching out before you.  You can travel
further into the graveyard to the north, or you can exit to the south,
through a huge gate.

5101.short: ...You are standing in an ancient decrepit graveyard.
5101.long:
This part of the graveyard appears to be badly in need of repair.  Most
of the headstones have fallen over and the ones that are still upright
are leaning over precariously.  The ground here is soaked with water
and the smell is rather revolting.  Looking down, you notice that even
several human bones are protruding up from their graves.

5102.long:
There is loose dirt lining the walls of this grave, and you now realize
that you cannot climb up and go back the way you came.  The ground
is very muddy and you are sinking just a little into the muck.  There
seems to be some sort of tunnel leading off to the north, but it is too
dark to see into the tunnel clearly.

5103.short: ...You are standing in a very dark tunnel.
5103.long:
You are surrounded by dirt and mud.  Looking at the ceiling you can see
all the roots from the trees above.  You notice they cover the tunnel
walls as well and they almost appear to move.
5103.item: partially submerged in the slippery floor.

5104.short: ...You are standing in a very dark tunnel.
5104.long:
There are roots everywhere, but looking over to the east you notice
that some of the roots have been broken off.  On the east wall is an
open passageway through a door frame.  The tunnel continues to the west.
5104.item: barely visible on the dirt ground.

5105.short: ...You are standing in a very dark tunnel.
5105.long:
You are surrounded by dirt.  The ceiling and walls are still covered in
tree roots.  But looking upward you notice that there is a small shard
of light sneaking in through a small break in the earth.
5105.item: hardly visible on the dirt covered floor.

5106.short: ...You are standing in a dark cavern.
5106.long:
It is very dark in this cave.  As your eyes adjust to the light, you
can see that there are deep scratches and trickles of dried blood in
all the walls around you.  The floor is damp and the smell is
overwhelmingly rotten.  Looking to the west, you see an open doorway,
and to the north is another exit.
5106.item: reflecting a little light at your feet.

5107.short: ...You are standing in a dark cavern.
5107.long:
The walls are marked with huge scratches and large splotches of blood.
There are bits and pieces of broken wood and metal here on the ground.
Most of the metal objects seem to be half-buried into the wet earth.
You may exit to the east or south.

5108.short: ...You are standing in a dark lair.
5108.long:
The walls of this room have deep gouges and fresh blood streaks.  The
floor is stained a dull brownish red, an eerie sight, knowing it has
been stained only by blood.  There seems to be a huge collection of
broken pieces of wood in the southeast corner of this room.  It is
piled around a small mound of raised earth.  This appears to be the bed
of some hideous creature.

5109.short: ...You are standing in a dark cavern.
5109.long:
There are sharp cuts in the east wall with smears of blood on the floor
beneath them.  There is a hazy outline of a wall to the north.  The
cavern leads off to the north, west and south.

5110.short: ...You are standing in a dark cavern.
5110.long:
To the west, you notice a small mound of dirt that leads up toward
the top if the cavern.  The floor here is rather muddy and you see a
lot of human-sized footprints in the mud leading off to the west up
onto the small hill.  It is obvious that something or someone has tried
to escape up this hill, but, judging from the bright streaks of fresh
blood, they didn't quite succeed.  You can exit to the east or west.

5111.short: ...You are climbing up a hill of dirt.
5111.long:
You are standing halfway up a small mound of bloodied dirt.  The mound
seems to get much steeper to the west and looks almost impossible to
climb.  You can go back down the hill to the east.

5112.short: ...You are standing in a narrow room.
5112.long:
You are standing in a long, narrow room.  In the floor off toward the
west end of the room is a huge, bubbling pool of water.  The walls
and floors here are smooth, and they seem to sparkle like tiny diamonds
in the light from the pool.  You can exit to the south.

5113.short: ...You are floating atop a small pool.
5113.long:
You are floating in a small pool.  You feel the water bubble and gush
all around you, making you feel calm and serene.  Sticking your head
beneath the water and diving down deeper, you could probably get a
better view of the walls of this radiant pool.

5114.short: ...You are swimming in a deep pool.
5114.long:
You see many small bubbles rushing past you, seeking the water surface
and you feel the gush of warm water against your face as you dive down
deeper into the pool.  Along the edges of this pool are little ledges
with cracks and crevices of all different sizes.  The water from below
seems to be flowing so strongly here, you cannot go any deeper, but you
may return to the surface of the pool.
5114.item: perched on the ledge in the pool.

5200.long:
You are in a thick, green forest next to a a giant tree.  The trees
here are very healthy, with moss on every trunk.  It looks like you
could climb the giant tree fairly easily.
5200.item: at the base of the tree.

5201.short: ...You're at the top of a tree.
5201.long:
You are surrounded by leaves and branches at the top of the giant tree.
The sunlight here is almost blinding with no forest ceiling to
block it out.  Looking down, you have an excellent view of the forest
floor and could easily climb down the trunk of the tree.  Branches from
nearby trees are reachable to the east.

5202.long:
You are standing on the thick branches that run between the trees of
the forest.  The sky above you is a clear blue and you can see down to
ground from here.  The branches extend east and west, or you can go
down to the forest floor.

5203.long:
You are standing on the thick branches that run between the trees of
the forest.  The sky above you is a clear blue and you can see down to
ground from here.  The branches extend south and west, or you can go
down to the forest floor.

5204.long:
You are standing on the thick branches that run between the trees of
the forest.  The sky above you is a clear blue and you can see down to
ground from here.  The branches extend north and south, or you can go
down to the forest floor.

5205.long:
You are standing on the thick branches that run between the trees of
the forest.  The sky above you is a clear blue and you can see down to
ground from here.  To the west, you can see the roof of an old tower.
The branches also extend north from here.

5206.short: ...You're at the top of an abandoned tower.
5206.long:
You're standing on the stone roof of a wasted tower.  All around you
are broken implements of war: catapults, ballistae, and some splintered
pieces of wood you can't even identify.  The structure of the tower is
questionable, with giant, ragged craters visible beneath your feet.
You can only wonder at what magical onslaught could wreak this much
damage against the strength of Earth.  To the south, you can see the
sheer face of a giant cliff.  You may exit through the tree branches to
the east, or down a granite staircase.

5207.short: ...You're in the remains of an armory.
5207.long:
You're standing at the base of a staircase, in what appears to be an
armory.  The north and east walls are lined with cracks in the rock.
Mounted on the walls are a number of weapons, but they are all broken
and bent.  The frame of the trapdoor above you is shattered and you can
see chunks of rock on the floor that must have been the door itself.
You may exit up the stairs, south, and west.

5208.long:
You're in what appears to be a conference room.  The room is dominated
by the crushed remains of a very large table.  There are piles of
rubble around the table that could only have been chairs.  Whatever
magical force laid waste to this outpost must have been a mighty one.
There is a hole in the north wall lined with broken glass, but it is
completely grown over with weeds making passage and visibility
impossible.  You can follow the cracking hall to the south and east.

5209.long:
You're in what must have once been a storage room, although it is now
barely recognizable as such.  The room is filled with broken shelves
and cabinets.  You notice small holes in the walls that must have held
them up and wonder what kind of fury it would take to tear them down.
The shelves are devoid of supplies, surely eaten long ago by the
denizens of the swamp.  The hall extends to the north and east.

5210.long:
You are in what appears to be a torture room, filled with implements of
pain.  All manner of torture devices are here, and the floor is stained
with blood and a few other substances.  You notice that the walls here
are severely damaged, with huge gashes and fissures as if rent by some
unearthly creature.  In the south wall, there is an opening about six
feet tall and three feet wide.  Next to the opening is a lever.  You
may exit to the north, south, or west.

5211.long:
This part of the forest is buried in a few inches of water.  The ground
here is overgrown with marsh weeds.  To the west, the forest becomes
dry and you can see a very large oak tree in that direction.  As you
proceed east, the oak trees are replaced by some thick swamp tree you
can't recognize.  Above you, the ceiling of leaves is so thick, you can
barely tell where the sun is in the sky.  You may exit in any direction.
5211.item: lying on a patch of dirt.

5212.long:
The swamp here is nearly impassable from its depth, about three feet.
Your vision is almost completely nil from the thick web of branches and
leaves at the top of the swamp trees.  To the west, the level of the
water becomes more hospitable.  You may also wade to the south, but all
other exits are impassable.

5213.long:
You're in a very wet marsh area.  The water here is a few feet deep,
making passage slow and painstaking.  Above you, the thick swamp trees
meet to form an almost solid shield against the sunlight, casting the
area in near-darkness.  The land rises to the west, but the swamp is
impassable to the east.

5214.long:
This corner of the swamp is infested with insects of all kinds,
constantly biting you and flying in your eyes.  To the west, an worn
stone wall blocks your exit.  Looking up, you can see where the
branches from the swamp trees grow near the roof of the old tower.  The
swamp quickly becomes impassable to the south and east.

5215.long:
You are standing in a jail cell.  There is a smashed wooden bench
against the north wall, but the room is otherwise devoid of features.
The walls of this room made from some very dense stone you cannot
identify.  There are a few lines in the walls, probably carved by
prisoners, but they are otherwise undamaged.  There is an opening in
the north wall.

5300.long:
This cave entrance is uncomfortably warm from the hot mist drifting
into the room from the north.  Through the light from the east
entrance, you can see the the walls and floor are made up of some
strange white rock that is pitted with tiny holes.

5301.long:
This tunnel is composed of a strange white rock.  There is a column of
mist blowing in from the north and out the south exit.  Although the
mist is very dry, its heat makes you sweat.  There is a side-tunnel
that runs west of here.

5302.long:
This area is dimly lit by light coming in from the east.  In the weak
light, you can see that this tunnel runs from east to west.  You also
notice a few small holes in the north wall, but you can't see anything
inside them.

5303.long:
This appears to be the end of a tunnel where it curves to the north,
from which direction a flickering light illuminates the room.  To the
east, you can see a faint bit of sunlight.

5304.long:
This section of tunnel is apparently the entrance to some room, as it
widens to the east.  This room is fairly well-lit by a fire glowing to
the east, and you can see only darkness to the south.

5305.long:
You're in the abode of some hideous beast.  The room is dominated by a
large open pit in the center of the room.  The pit appears to be full
of some oily substance and the remains of this creature's kills.  You
notice arms and legs, most of them gnawed to bones, but some still with
meat on them.  Although the pit is on fire, the bones near the edges of
the pit are relatively unharmed.  There is a pile of straw in one
corner, which can only be the monster's bed.

5306.long:
This tunnel is composed of a strange white rock.  There is a column of
mist blowing in from the north and out the south exit.  Although the
mist is very dry, its heat makes you sweat.

5307.long:
This tunnel is composed of a strange white rock.  There is a column of
mist blowing in from the north and out the south exit.  The temperature
of the mist here is almost overpowering in its intensity.  You notice a
side-tunnel to the west.

5308.short: ...You're at the end of a misty tunnel.
5308.long:
The north wall of this room is venting a super hot mist that blows
through the room to the south.  The porous white rock on the north wall
is warped and bent, as if heated to the melting point.  The heat here
is nearly unbearable, making you want to use the only exit to the
south.

5309.long:
You're in an underground passage that is barely lit through cracks in
the ceiling.  All of the rock here is of a strange, white porous
substance, making it hard to maintain your sense of direction.  You can
exit to the north, east, or west.

5310.long:
You're in an underground passage that is barely lit through cracks in
the ceiling.  All of the rock here is of a strange, white porous
substance, making it hard to maintain your sense of direction.  The
tunnel ends abruptly to the north and you can exit to the south.

5311.long:
You're in an underground passage that is barely lit through cracks in
the ceiling.  All of the rock here is of a strange, white porous
substance, making it hard to maintain your sense of direction.  You
can exit to the east or west.

5312.long:
You're in an underground passage that is barely lit through cracks in
the ceiling.  All of the rock here is of a strange, white porous
substance, making it hard to maintain your sense of direction.  The
tunnel ends to the west and you can exit to the north or south.

5313.long:
You're in an underground passage that is barely lit through cracks in
the ceiling.  All of the rock here is of a strange, white porous
substance, making it hard to maintain your sense of direction.  The
tunnel ends to the north and you can exit to the east or south.

5314.long:
You're in an underground passage that is barely lit through cracks in
the ceiling.  All of the rock here is of a strange, white porous
substance, making it hard to maintain your sense of direction.  The
tunnel ends here and your only exit is to the west.

5315.long:
You're in an underground passage that is barely lit through cracks in
the ceiling.  All of the rock here is of a strange, white porous
substance, making it hard to maintain your sense of direction.  You can
exit to the north or south.

5316.long:
You're in an underground passage that is barely lit through cracks in
the ceiling.  All of the rock here is of a strange, white porous
substance, making it hard to maintain your sense of direction.  There
is a faint smell of sulfur from the south.   You can exit to the north
or south.

5317.long:
This appears to be the entrance to a large underground cavern.  To the
south, the walls and floor exhale steam into the room, which disappears
through the cracks in the ceiling.  It is uncomfortably warm here and
you feel an urge to exit to the north or south.

5318.long:
You're in a rather unstable underground cavern.  The steam rising from
the floor periodically turns to flame, causing you to jump in panic.
The top of the cavern is barely visible, but appears to be almost
completely covered with sleeping flame bats.

5400.long:
This building was apparently used to quarter livestock of some sort,
but has long since passed into disrepair.  Although the stone walls are
intact, there is a wooden ladder to a loft that is questionable, and
the floor is covered with rotten, dried hay.  You can exit to the west
or climb the ladder up.

5500.long:
You're in what appears to be a loft, but it is hard to tell in its
current state of neglect.  The walls here are battered, with cracks
running down through the floor to the ground below.  On the north wall,
there is a rack of wine bottles, although some of them are broken,
venting a foul odor.  The east wall is dominated by a giant portal,
seemingly filled with water.  You peer into it, but can only see murky
darkness.  You can exit through the portal or down the ladder.

5600.long:
You're inside a giant tree, at least ten paces wide.  In all
directions, glowing portals shimmer in the bark, bathing the room in an
eerie blue light.  The floor here is a nest of gnarled roots and moist
soil.

5700.long:
This clearing is strangely devoid of the thick vines in the forest
around this region.  A circle of grass seems to hold back the vines,
about twenty paces in diamater.  In the middle of the circle, a small,
nondescript altar stands, seemingly forcing the vines back with some
power.  You can exit in any direction.

5800.long:
This is a very strange square room.  On each of the four walls, you can
see hundreds of glyphs and symbols carved into the rock and painted
with bright colors.  In the center of each wall is a small disc, which
is emanating a faint beam towards the center of the room.  All four
beams intersect at a pedestal which stands in the middle of the room.
In the floor, next to the pedestal is a hole big enough to go through,
although you cannot see what is below.

5900.long:
There are huge swirling mists all around you.  You can hardly
breathe through the thick fog.  Every once in a while you are able to
glimpse a dead, withered tree.  Southward, you seem to feel a hot wave
of mist.  Watching the fog mix and spin around, you get a little dizzy
and a little disoriented.  Even the ground here looks bathed in white
mists.
5900.item: where it shouldn't be.  NOTIFY SYSOP!

5901.long:
There are huge swirling mists all around you.  You can hardly
breathe through the thick fog.  Every once in a while you are able to
glimpse a dead, withered tree.  Watching the fog mix and spin around,
you get a little dizzy and a little disoriented.  Even the ground here
looks bathed in white mists.
5901.item: where it shouldn't be.  NOTIFY SYSOP!

5902.long:
There are huge swirling mists all around you.  You can hardly
breathe through the thick fog.  Every once in a while you are able to
glimpse a dead, withered tree.  Watching the fog mix and spin around,
you get a little dizzy and a little disoriented.  Even the ground here
looks bathed in white mists.
5902.item: where it shouldn't be.  NOTIFY SYSOP!

5903.long:
There are huge swirling mists all around you.  You can hardly
breathe through the thick fog.  Every once in a while you are able to
glimpse a dead, withered tree.  Watching the fog mix and spin around,
you get a little dizzy and a little disoriented.  Even the ground here
looks bathed in white mists.  To the south, you can make out a giant
tree through the boiling fog.
5903.item: where it shouldn't be.  NOTIFY SYSOP!

5904.long:
There is wild dense fog drifting and swirling all around you, the vague
outlines of trees fades in and out of view.  A strong wind is blowing
through the mists, but it only makes them spin and billow more.
The patches of ground that you are able to see, are dry and cracking.
The forest gets more enshrouded to the west.

5905.long:
Through the mists, you are surprised to see the really unhealthy look
of the trees.  There are no leaves, and the "skin" of the tree seems to
be wrinkling up from dehydration.  It almost looks as if all the
moisture is gone from the tree.  A windy road lies to the east.

5906.long:
There are huge swirling mists all around you.  You can hardly
breathe through the thick fog.  Every once in a while you are able to
glimpse a dead, withered tree.  Watching the fog mix and spin around,
you get a little dizzy and a little disoriented.  Even the ground here
looks bathed in white mists.
5906.item: where it shouldn't be.  NOTIFY SYSOP!

5907.long:
There are huge swirling mists all around you.  You can hardly
breathe through the thick fog.  Every once in a while you are able to
glimpse a dead, withered tree.  Watching the fog mix and spin around,
you get a little dizzy and a little disoriented.  Even the ground here
looks bathed in white mists.  To the east, you can faintly make out a
giant tree.
5907.item: where it shouldn't be.  NOTIFY SYSOP!

5908.short: ...You are standing in a mist-enshrouded forest.
5908.long:
The fog is a little dense in places.  You see withering trees and dying
leaves.  There are a few bushes at the bases of the trees and they have
almost no leaves at all.  The ground is very dry and a little dusty
here.  There is a giant tree to the west, blocking your passage.
5908.item: slightly hidden beneath some dead bushes.

5909.short: ...You are standing in a mist-enshrouded forest.
5909.long:
There is a bit of a wind here, and as it blows through the trees, it
knocks off some leaves.  The trees have bark that is flaking off from
lack of water.  You would almost think it was Fall with the dried
leaves covering the ground, but the sickeningly dehydrated trees dash
such pleasant thoughts.  You can see a windswept road to the east.
5909.item: lying upon the dry, cracking ground.

5910.long:
Straining to see through the dense fog, you are able to pick out some
sick looking trees.  They are completely dead, drained of all water and
leaves.  The long, barren branches seem to reach out for you, like a
wicked creature beckoning its prey.  The forest gets thicker to the
north.
5910.item: in the grasp of a dead tree.

5911.long:
The thick mists obscure most of your vision.  They seem so fascinating,
rolling and contorting all around.  You can see some distant tree
shadows and some barren ground.

5912.short: ...You are standing in a mist-enshrouded forest.
5912.long:
The mists ebb and tide here amidst lifeless trees.  You wonder how long
these poor trees have gone without water, how long they have stood,
waiting for the slightest rain.  The bark is hanging off of the trees,
and breaking up in the intermittant wind, no longer full of enough life
to cling to the trunk.  To the north, you can see a giant tree,
blocking your passage in that direction.

5913.short: ...You are standing in a misty forest.
5913.long:
The trees here are nearly dead.  The leaves are hanging pitifully off
of the branches above you.  Some leaves have fallen onto the ground,
and they crunch dryly at your every step.  The forest deepens to the
north and west.

5914.short: ...You are standing in a misty forest.
5914.long:
There is a small, winding mist surging in and around the tree trunks
here.  Some fallen leaves blow gently on the ground.  The trees are
dying and seem dehydrated.  A windy road is to the east.
5914.item: encircled by some mists at your feet.

5915.long:
Looking around seems to do very little good.  The mesmerizing mists are
almost smothering you, directly in front of your face, unable to be
waved away by your hand.

5916.short: ...You are standing in a mist-enshrouded forest.
5916.long:
Several trees are leaning over and resting in the forks of other trees.
The bark is all but polished off by the elements and the leaves are all
gone.  The mists hover underneath the archways created by the fallen
trees and seem to beckon you.
5916.item: beneath the archway of a fallen tree.

5917.short: ...You are standing in a misty forest.
5917.long:
The dying trees of this forest seem in need of water.  The branches are
drooping over and the leaves that are left are shriveling up.  There is
an occasional breeze that brings with it a wispy mist.  The forest gets
more misty to the north and west.

5918.long:
There is a slight breeze here, thinning out the mists in some places.
The trees can almost be seen in some of the thin patches of fog.  They
look old, and dead, half of the branches have been broken off and are
lying around the trunks.  A sandy road can be seen to the south.

5919.short: ...You are standing in a mist-enshrouded forest.
5919.long:
The air here is a bit warm, and definately holds little to no moisture.
The trees are surrounded by an ominous mist, but you are still able to
see the decaying leaves and the withering branches.  The dead bark has
turned to a dark brown, crumbly dirt at your feet.  A dusty road is
visible to the south.

5920.short: ...You are standing in a misty forest.
5920.long:
Looking up at the trees, you get a slight shiver down your spine
from the haunting wisps of fog weaving in and out of the tree branches
above you.  There are a few rocks and some dead leaves on the
ground.  The dying trees seemingly trying to hide the dead and wilted
leaves from all eyes in the mists.  A dusty road is visible to the
south.

5921.short: ...You're standing in a dark forest of vines.
5921.long:
There are trees here that are so overgrown with vines, you actually
have to wonder if the trees underneath the vines are still alive.
Although it is very dark in this part of the forest, you still notice
the hanging vines blowing in the wind all around you.  Looking north
and west, the greenery is too thick to traverse.

5922.short: ...You're standing in a dark forest of vines.
5922.long:
As you look about, you are surrounded by long, clinging vines hanging
down from the tree limbs.  They sway in the wind ominously, and seem to
reach out for you through the darkness.  The forest leads off to the
east and west.
5922.item: wedged between some thick vine roots.

5923.short: ...You're standing in a dark forest of vines.
5923.long:
There are vines hanging down so close all around, you would think you
were standing beneath a willow tree in mid-spring.  They seem to taunt
you and brush by your face at every turn.  The foilage has become too
dense to travel to the north or east.

5924.short: ...You're standing in a dark forest of vines.
5924.long:
It is dimly lit here and the wind is blowing gently.  The trees are
engulfed by wild vines with thick entangled roots.  The swaying shadows
of the vines seem to resemble hypnotic snakes.  A windy road is visible
to the west.
5924.item: here at the base of the trees.

5925.short: ...You're standing in a dark forest of vines.
5925.long:
There is a slight breeze blowing through the leaves and vines covering
the trees.  Listening closely you seem to hear it whistle off in the
distance.  There is a slight smell of cinnamon on the wind.  The
forest seems to grow darker to the north and east.
5925.item: bound against a tree with some vines.

5926.short: ...You're standing in a dark forest of vines.
5926.long:
There are dark, raging vines reaching off of the trees towards you.
Light barely creeps through the thick vines overhead.  Looking to the
east, you notice the vines have completely grown over and throughout a
tall fence and the north route seems impassible.

5927.long:
The trees here look like huge homes for the clinging vines.  Even the
branches are being used as supports for the eagerly growing vines.
A windy road is to the west and the forest gets thicker to the north
and east.

5928.long:
The wild vines have nearly consumed the trees here.  The little
spiraling, twisting vines are reaching down from out of the trees above
you.  The forest is all around you here and it smells faintly of
cinnamon.
5928.item: wedged between a tree and some vines.

5929.long:
Looking about you, the tree trunks are composed entirely of wild,
clinging vines.  The vines cross over each other and wind their way up
onto the branches above.  Looking north and east, it would seem that
the forest becomes denser.

5930.short: ...You're standing in a dark forest of vines.
5930.long:
There are soft shadows cast by the huge vines hanging down from above.
The vines appear almost like spiderwebs, crossing over each other
between the trees in large intricate patterns.  To the east, there is a
large fence that has been overgrown with thick vines, and greenery.

5931.short: ...You're standing in a forest with vines.
5931.long:
The trees here are slowly being covered with vines.  They have mostly
covered the trunks and are just beginning to reach the branches with
their outstretching tendrils.  Going west will put you on a wind-blown
road, any other direction will take you into another part of the
forest.
5931.item: resting at the base of a tree.

5932.short: ...You're standing in a forest with vines.
5932.long:
Thick vines have grown out of the ground and are travelling up and
covering the trees as they go.  You notice the branches above are free
of clinging vines, for now.  There are trees all around you.

5933.long:
Wild, raging vines are using the trees here to grow on.  The trees are
obviously suffering in health from the abuse of the vines.  The vines
have wrapped around the tree limbs and are beginning to hang down from
them.  The forest encircles you here.

5934.short: ...You're standing in a dark forest of vines.
5934.long:
The trees here seem to be grouped together thickly.  This seems to make
little difference to the conquering vines.  The thick, rope-like vines
have wrapped all around and up the trees, stretching down through the
branches and up above them to reach into the sunlight.  The air here is
a bit humid and there seems to be a few more small bushes around the
trees.

5935.short: ...You're standing in a dark forest of vines.
5935.long:
The vines hang down around you like an ominous presence.  Light here is
struggling to shine down through the masses of entangled vines above
you.  The trees are much too thick to travel to the east, but to the
north, you can see a large open gate draped with huge vines.
5935.item: lying next to the old gate.

5936.short: ...You are standing in a thin forest.
5936.long:
The trees here are very thin and wispy looking.  Looking up at the
trees, you get the idea that these trees are under nourished.  The
ground here is mostly dirt with very few patches of grass.  The grass
appears thick and dull.  The forest continues to the north and east.
A windy road lies to the west.  Looking through the trees to the south,
you see an old building with a window that has been boarded up and is
obviously impassable from this direction.

5937.short: ...You are standing in a thin forest.
5937.long:
There are trees all around you.  They are lacking in health, as you can
tell from the slight drooping of the branches.  At the base of the
trees, some grass can be seen growing, the rest of the ground appears
barren.  To the south, there is a big tree that seems to have a few
healthy looking bushes around by its base.

5938.short: ...You're standing in a forest with vines.
5938.long:
The trees here are semi-covered with growing vines that seem to be
draining the life-force of the trees.  The vines are reaching up to the
branches, and will soon overtake them.  The forest appears a little
thicker to the north and east.

5939.long:
The trees here look pitiful next to the thriving vines rapidly growing
over and through them.  The creeping vines have grown up onto the tree
so far, that they are now beginning to hang down from the tree limbs.

5940.short: ...You're standing in a dark forest of vines.
5940.long:
The vines here are nearly touching the ground.  The sky is hardly
visible through the thick tangled masses of vines above your head.  The
trees are no longer the dominate figures of this forest, it is now the
over-abundant, climbing vines.  They have grown over too thickly to
travel to the east.

5941.short: ...You are standing in a thin forest.
5941.long:
Trees all around, you look and wonder what could be taking away the
life-force of these trees.  There is hardly any grass growing here
among the trees.

5942.short: ...You're standing in a forest with vines.
5942.long:
The ground seems a bit wet in this area of the forest.  The wild vines
have grown over the bases of the trees, but you can still see part of
the trunks and the branches overhead.  The forest seems to get darker
and thicker to the north.

5943.long:
Clinging vines grow out of the ground and up onto the trees in this
area of the forest.  They grow so close and tight against the trees, it
appears the vines are suffocating them.  The ground here is a bit damp
and notably soft.

5944.short: ...You're standing in a dark forest of vines.
5944.long:
The ground here is sopping wet.  You sink into the muddy ground a
little as you stand here looking about.  The vines and trees are
thickly meshed together to the north and east and are obviously
impassable.

5945.short: ...You are standing in a thin forest.
5945.long:
Here in this skinny forest that looks to be in poor health, you can
hardly find a blade of grass, let alone any foilage.  The ground
appears a bit dry with some pieces of bark lying on the ground.

5946.short: ...You're standing in a forest with vines.
5946.long:
There are wild vines that are growing up onto the trees and have almost
completely covered the tree trunks.  The ground is a little soft and
damp.  A dusty road is visible to the south.

5947.long:
There are thick, healthy vines here that are slowly draining the
nutrients from the trees they grow upon.  The wild vines have overcome
most of the trees and are still growing out over the branches.  The
ground here is somewhat wet, as is the road that is visible to the
south.

5948.short: ...You're standing in a dark forest of vines.
5948.long:
The forest here is comprised mostly of vines that hang down around
you in huge curtains.  There is enough water on the ground here to
cover your feet.  You feel a bit wary, walking in this muddy water that
you can't see into, wondering if something is lurking within it.
Through the vines, to the south, you can see a wet road.
5948.item: drifting on the surface of the water.

5949.long:
You're in a dried-out, sandy desert.  The ground here is a light brown
dirt with patches of sand.  The heat here is almost unbearable and the
dried-out remains of some cacti lead you to believe that it was once
hospitable.  You can exit in any direction but west, which is blocked
by a huge chasm.

5950.long:
This forest, if you could call it that, is composed almost entirely of
cholla jumping cactus.  You are careful to avoid bumping into any of
the nasty plants, as they all but block your path.  You notice a few
burned tree trunks with blackened bark, but the cause of the
destruction is not apparent.  To the west, the desert floor becomes
barren.
5950.item: lying near one of the cholla.

5951.long:
The trees in this room are very thin and darkly-colored and you can't
identify their type.  You notice that the ground here is very dry and
the trees are almost devoid of leaves.  To the west, the ground becomes
even less fertile.  You can exit in any directions.
5951.item: lying near one of the trees.

5952.long:
This section of forest appears to be slowly dying, for the trees are
very thin and do not have many leaves.  Although you cannot tell what
kind of tree they are, they definitely do not appear to be surviving
very well, as a few are uprooted and laying sideways.  There is a city
wall to the east, but you can exit in any other direction.

5953.long:
This featureless plain is completely bare of life, a dry desert.  The
temperature here is uncomfortably hot and the sun's bright light
reflects of the nearly white ground in a blinding glare.  Looking east,
you can see the remains of some form of desert plant.

5954.long:
This area is made very hot by the unrelenting sun beating down on the
ground.  There are a few dead trees here, with blackened bark and very
thin limbs.  Most of them are slowly decaying, but some are still
upright, although dead.  To the west, the desert becomes completely
inhospitable.  There is a stone building to the south that appears
relatively unharmed, but you can see no form of entry or windows.

5955.long:
This forest is nearly bereft of life, with stumps and fallen trees all
around.  The few trees that are standing are charred and blackened as
if by some destructive energy.  You can exit in any direction.

5956.long:
This section of the hot forest is decaying with time, gradually turning
into a lifeless desert.  Although the trees here are still fairly
healthy, you can see the line of death encroaching: as you look to the
west, you see more and more dead trees.  The east exit is blocked by a
city, but you can exit in any other direction.

5957.long:
This nondescript area is simply a plain of sterile dust.  In every
direction, featureless sand stretches on and on.  To the west, the sand
ends abruptly in a huge chasm, blocking your exit in that direction.
You can exit in any other direction.

5958.long:
You're in an expanse of desert, barren of life or feature.  The sun
beats down on you and the sand extends in every direction.  To the
east, you notice a stone building that has apparently withstood the
desert's trials.  There is a small opening in the side of the building
that you could enter through.

5959.long:
The trees here are nearly lifeless, victims of the relentless desert
heat.  You see a number of fallen trees, their roots clutching at the
dry air.  To the west, a stone structure is visible.  It appears to be
a small building, although you cannot detect any openings or doors.
You can exit in any direction but west.

5960.long:
You're in a rather sickly forest, with thin trees.  The trees are all
but blackened and possess very few leaves.  Here and there, you can see
where a tree yielded to the limitless strength of the sun and fell to
earth.  You can exit in any direction.

5961.long:
This section of the forest seems a bit livelier than that to the west,
where you can see numbers of fallen trees.  The trees here are a thin
variety, but they are possessed of small brown leaves and most of the
trees appear to be surviving.  To the north, a city wall blocks your
exit.  You can exit in any other direction.

5962.long:
You're in a fairly sparse section of forest, with scattered trees of a
strange type you don't recognize.  The thin, dark trees have only a few
leaves, and their ranks appear to thin to the west.  You can exit in
any direction except north, which is blocked by a city wall.

5963.long:
This desert was apparently once a forest, but it is now nothing but a
burned out wasteland.  Around you are trees of various types, cactus,
and even some bushes; everything is blacked and burned, with bits of
ash drifting away on the wind.  To the south and west, a yawning chasm
blocks your passage, but you can exit in any other direction.

5964.long:
You're standing in the remains of a long-dead forest of some type.
Only a few signs of life remain, and these are simply dead, decaying
trees.  The desert becomes even more brutal to the west.

5965.long:
This area appears to be a once-healthy forest that was destroyed by the
desert's heat.  Many of the dead trees are still standing in the
infertile ground, but they are blackened and withered from the heat.
To the north, you see a small stone structure, but you cannot detect
any doors or windows in it.  You can exit in any other direction.

5966.long:
You're in an arrid desert, almost without life.  There are a few
scrawny trees here, but they seem to be struggling just to stay
upright, much less grow.  To the north, the desert appears to grow more
life, but it is barren to the south and west.

5967.long:
This forest is composed of rather sickly, thin trees.  With a lack of
leaves on these strange trees, the sun beats down on you, sapping your
strength.  To the east, the forest becomes more lively.

5968.long:
You're in a sparsely-populated segment of forest.  The trees here are
of a dark color, with almost black bark on them.  To the east, the
trees appear more plentiful, and you can exit in any direction.

5969.long:
The trees here are all covered with a strange, darkly-colored bark.
Upon first glance, they appear black, but closer inspection shows them
to be a very dark shade of brown.  To the west, these trees seem to
thin out a bit.  You may exit in any direction.

5970.long:
You're in what was at some time a healthy, growing forest.  All that
remains now, however, is the burnt remains of trees and cacti.  Some
force has all but eradicated every sign of life from this area, leaving
burned out shells.  A huge chasm blocks your exit to the west and
south, but you can exit in any other direction.

5971.long:
This region was apparently once a forest, but it is now only a dried up
wasteland.  You can see the remains of trees all around you; they are
blackened and burned, completely lifeless.  You can exit in any
direction but north.
5971.item: lying next to a fallen tree.

5972.long:
You're standing in strange mix of forest and desert.  The ground here
is hard and dry, like a desert.  However, there are some trees growing
here, although most of them appear to be dying.  They are all burned
somehow, their brown bark turned almost to black.  You can exit in any
direction.

5973.long:
This part of the forest is fairly thin, populated with slender, dark
trees.  Some of the trees are blackened, as if seared by some magical
fire or other cataclysm.  Your vision is blocked to the south by a
shimmering wall of blue force in the middle of the forest.  In the
middle of the wall, there is an archway just big enough to walk
through.
5973.item: lying near one of the dark trees.

5974.long:
You're standing in a lighty populated forest.  The trees here are very
small and thin making the area more of a plain than a forest.  To the
north and east, the forest becomes thicker.  West of here, you can see
a desert plain in the distance.  You can exit in any direction.

5975.long:
This forest is full of dark trees, their bark almost black.  The thin
ranks of vegetation offer no protection from the sun beating down on
you.  To the west, the forest becomes thinner.

5976.long:
You're in a wasteland of burned trees.  There are countless trees here,
all of them blackened and crumbling.  To the west and south, a giant
chasm blocks your exit.  You can leave in any other direction.

5977.long:
This section of the desert is burned beyond recognition.  You can see
the remains of what might have been some trees, but it's too hard to
tell.  The east exit is dominated by a bright blue force field, making
passage that way impossible.  You can exit in any other direction.

5978.long:
You're standing in a forest of small, thin trees.  Your attention is
drawn to the west exit, where a bright blue force field is glowing.
The wall is about eight feet high and twenty feet wide, and you can't
see through it.  You can exit in any other direction.

5979.long:
This forest area is lighty populated, making passage easy.  The trees
here have a rich brown bark, bordering on black.  To the south, your
exit is blocked by a giant cliff face.  You can exit in any other
direction.
5979.item: nestled in one of the trees.

5980.long:
You're in what must have been a very thick forest.  The burned out
husks of trees are everywhere, making passage fairly difficult.  You
notice a few singed skeletons here, also, some of them human.  The west
exit is blocked by a huge chasm which passes behind a cliff to the
south.  You can exit in any other direction.

5981.long:
This former forest is now a graveyard of dead trees.  All of the thin
trees are burned, most of them collapsed on the earth.  The north exit
from here is blocked by a glowing blue wall of force, preventing
passage in that direction.  To the south, a giant cliff face blocks
exiting.

5982.long:
You're in a partially burned-out desert.  The few trees that are here
are scorched, as if by some catastrophic event.  The south and east
exits are blocked by a huge cliff face, but you can exit in any other
direction.
5982.item: lying next to a singed tree.

5983.long:
You're in a green forest area, undergrown with bushes.  Trees surround
you on all sides, restricting your vision.  The tops of the trees are
grown almost together, creating a layer of leaves that filters the
sunlight to a twilight.  There is a stone wall to the west, but there
are exits to the north, east, and south.

5984.long:
You're in an oak forest that is slowly turning to swamp.  Although the
oaks grow plentiful here, the ground grows wet to the east and the
undergrowth is thin here.  The treetops here block out the sun, casting
the room in twilight.  The forest is impassable to the south, but you
may exit to the north, east, and west.

5985.long:
You're in a muddy oak forest, with trees growing from the muddy earth
on all sides.  The tops of the oak trees join together and block the
sun almost completely, leaving this area in shadow.  The forest floor
is more solid to the west.  The forest turns to a bog to the east and
is impassable.  You may exit to the north, south, or west.

5986.long:
You're in a green forest with oaks visible in every direction.  The
ground here is grown over with bushes of all kinds, making passage slow
and difficult.  Your vision is obscured by the masses of bushes and the
muted sunlight through the forest roof.  You can see a stone wall to
the west, and exits to the north, east, and south.
5986.item: lying at the base of an oak.

5987.long:
You're in a damp oak forest, with some undergrowth.  To the east, the
soil becomes more wet, although there are so signs of the trees
thinning out.  Through the shadows cast by the treetops, you can see
exits to the east, south, and west.  The forest is too thick to the
north to exit that direction.

5988.long:
The wet forest here causes you to leave water-filled footprints as you
walk.  Although the earth is saturated with water here, there are oaks
visible in every direction except east.  Through the dim light
filtering in from above, you can see that forest becomes a bog to the
east, but is passable to the north, south, and west.

5989.long:
The fresh green forest consists of high-growing oaks, many of whose
leaves have fallen to cover the forest floor.  Above you, the tops of
the oaks block out some of the sunlight.  You can exit to the east,
south, and west, but there is a stone wall to the north blocking
passage.

5990.long:
You're in a lush forest, with oaks all around you.  The light here is
muted from the oak leaves above and your visibility is limited by the
numbers of trees in every direction.  To your north, you can see a
stone wall.  You can exit to the east, south, and west.

5991.long:
This forest is thick and dark green here.  From the sheltering
treetops, you can only see a short distance in the gloom.  To the east,
you can see a single, very large oak.  You can exit in any direction.

5992.long:
This section of the forest is almost completely covered with wild
growing bushes of all kinds.  You find it interesting that the ground
life thrives when the giant oak trees shield most of the earth from
direct sunlight.

5993.long:
This part of the forest is dominated by a large thicket of thorny
brambles.  The undergrowth here is very thick and grows right up
against the brambles.  Through the gloomy sunlight, you can see exits
in all directions.

5994.long:
This oak forest is partially covered with bushes growing from all
around.  The sunlight from above is filtered by the tops of the tall
oaks, making this area fairly dark.

5995.long:
This area of the forest is very wet and you leave muddy footprints as
you walk.  To the north, you can see a particularly large oak tree.
The ground becomes more wet to the east, and there is a cracked stone
wall to the south.  The wall appears to be part of a tower.

5996.long:
You're in a very green swamp.  The forest to the west of here gradually
turns to swamp as you continue east.  Oak trees are still prevalent,
however, and you can see their roots through the shallow water.  To the
south, you can see an old stone wall, pitted with many scars and
scratches.  It appears to be the side of an abandoned tower.
5996.item: sticking out of the murky water.

5997.long:
This region is populated by oaks and huge amounts of bushes.  Looking
around, you can see berries and other bushes of every kind.  The oak
trees block out most of the sunlight, except to the south, where a
giant cliff face blocks your exit.  You may exit in any other
direction.

5998.long:
The undergrowth in this area makes passage very difficult, constantly
entangling your feet.  There is a cliff face blocking the exit to the
south.  The undergrowth extends in all other directions.
5998.item: lying at the base of a tree.

5999.long:
This corner of the forest is blocked off by a large stone wall to the
east that appears to be part of an old tower.  None of the oaks in this
area are tall enough to climb and reach the top of the building.  To
the south, a cliff face prevents passage.
